dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6164 IH: No Temporary Protected Status for Terrorists Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself and Mr. Tiffany) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of Homeland Security from granting certain aliens temporary protected status.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Temporary Protected Status for Terrorists Act or the No TPS for Terrorists Act.

section.header: Certain aliens ineligible for temporary protected status

subsection.text: The Secretary of Homeland Security may not grant a covered alien temporary protected status in the United States pursuant to section 244 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1254a).
In this section, the term covered alien means an alien who is a holder of a passport or other travel document issued by the Palestinian Authority.
